nothing.description: message shown if the popup is opened before any feed has been received

feedNameDialog.description: label for the feed name in add/edit feed dialog, in settings page

feedURLDialog.description: label for the feed URL in add/edit feed dialog, in settings page

feedMaxItemsDialog.description: label for the feed max items in add/edit feed dialog, in settings page

dialogClose.description: text related to the exit option of a dialog

dialogConfirm.description: text of the confirm button in a dialog

dialogCancel.description: text of the cancel button in a dialog

addNewFeedButton.description: text for the 'add new feed' button in settings

editFeedButton.description: text for the 'edit feed' button in settings

deleteFeedButton.description: text for the 'delete feed' button in settings

newFeedDialogTitle.description: title of the 'new feed' dialog box

editFeedDialogTitle.description: title of the 'edit feed' dialog box
